channel.title: My small request
channel.description:
Well, I am making a game, that a gaming website is interested in and I need some help on making flames.
All I need is 3 gif images, 15x15, that have transparent backgrounds. They must be flames, 1st: small flame, 2nd: large flame, 3rd medium flame. It will be part of a small animation so try to make them fit together.
I might need a little more later but this is all for now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2008, 02:19:43 pm[/size][hr]Sorry did I say gif, I meant png.

item.title: My small request
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:4, topic:223469”][quote author=pizza pie link=topic=293528.msg2364086#msg2364086 date=1217829751]
But I’m using them in a Java applet, so I don’t think GIF would work properly, I do believe that it only shows the last frame with GIF images.

Or if you have another reason plz share?
[/quote]

GIFs keep repeating themselves…
But if your using them in a Java applet, I guess it could be .PNG

No other reasons.[/quote]

ummm gifs have several frames then it repeats those frames over and over. So technically he could be right.

Read full topic

item.description:

So lol, can someone make it?
